text: Mike Boehm (October 23, 1955 - May 2, 2019) was an American music critic and arts reporter. He wrote for the Los Angeles Times from 1988 to 2015. ==References== Category:1955 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Yale University alumni Category:Columbia University Graduate School of Journalism alumni Category:American music critics Category:Los Angeles Times people
title: Mike Boehm
